text: What features of a problem suggest using common multiples? In what ways is it helpful to think of multiples using expressions with variables?

Student answers might include discussions of the following:

  • Things that cycle or repeat lead to looking at multiples.
  • When the cycles of the Ferris wheels matched, that is when the revolutions had common multiples.
  • Multiples can be represented by expression such as 30N. This would represent all of the multiples of 30.
